snippet: The worker's death and Erasmo Ponce's arrest cast a shadow over Mr. Ponce's profile as a success story in New York's growing Mexican population.
abstract: The worker's death and Erasmo Ponce's arrest cast a shadow over Mr. Ponce's profile as a success story in New York's growing Mexican population.

headline.main: Owner of Tortilla Factory Where Worker Died Admits Payroll Violations
headline.print_headline: Tortilla Maker Pleads Guilty To Violating Payroll Laws
